title: Cup And Saucer, 1930–31
markings: Marks: Printed in green script on underside of base: "Porzellanfabrik Arzberg/Arzberg (Bayern)"
dimensions:
Cup: height 4.7 cm, width 12 cm, diameter 10 cm
Plate: diameter:  14.8 cm
creditline: Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Fund
description: Molded creamy-grey porcelain body. (a) Hemispherical body with circular foot ring and simple loop handle. Red line around lip and in middle of handle on both sides. (b) Saucer circular, with molded circular depressionin center. Red line at edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cup And Saucer, 1930–31.
1930–31. Porcelain. Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Fund. 1992-10-5-a,b.
